author: tomwhite
msg: MAPREDUCE-4654. TestDistCp is ignored. Contributed by Sandy Ryza.

author: scottbw
msg: Added improved handling of updates for widgets with no identifier, reusing any previously-issued identifier. Note that one consequence is that widget identifiers are not updated on PUT. Note also this only applies when using the REST API, where there is a resource parameter for the widget ID. See WOOKIE-383.
